description:
A week after enrollment, the IChu of Class 3 are starting their activities in their idol units. Amidst all this, Principal Kuma issues them an assignment: If you don`t sell 3000 CDs within 3 months, you`ll be expelled! Each unit begins to move slowly toward accomplishing this goal, but F∞F just can`t seem to get in sync with each other...
Source: crunchyroll
